homeCard.startNewApplicationDescription: Do you want to secure Ethiopian Passport now? Provide all requested information and apply.
homeCard.registerDescription: Are you planning to be a frequent Passport user? Register and let us remember you so that you won’t have to fill application forms from scratch every time. This is optional.
homeCard.checkStatusDescription: What is the status of my Ethiopian Passport request? Provide all requested tracking information and check now.

beforYouApplyList.title: Before you apply
beforYouApplyList.itemOne: All applicants should secure an online appointment when applying for a passport
beforYouApplyList.itemThree: Applicants are reminded to be on site not earlier than 30 minutes on their selected date and time of appointment at their chosen consular office.
beforYouApplyList.itemFour: Personal appearance is required for new applicants.
beforYouApplyList.itemFive: Please be warned that dealing with fixers (illegal arrangements) is at your own risk and expense.
beforYouApplyList.itemSix: Prepare all the originals and photocopies of the documentary requirements for passport application.
beforYouApplyList.itemSeven: Prepare all the originals and photo copies of the documentary requirements for passport application.

requestAppointment.requestAppointmentList1: This Passport application form is applied only by Ethiopian National.
requestAppointment.requestAppointmentList2: To use more than one passport  is strictly prohibited
requestAppointment.requestAppointmentList3: Ordinary passport Applicant who have already passport should not be apply for new passport
requestAppointment.requestAppointmentDetail: Users accept the responsibility for supplying, checking, and verifying the accuracy and correctness of the information they provide. Incorrect or inaccurate information may result in forfeiture of passport application.All fees are non-refundable. Fees shall be forfeited for applicants who fail to show up on their confirmed appointment, applicants who cancel their appointment, and applicants whose application was rejected due to incorrect information.
requestAppointment.agree: I agree to the terms and conditions
requestAppointment.validation: Please check this box if you want to proceed.

renewPassport.title: Which type of Service you need?
renewPassport.expiredPassportDetial: Expired passport, applicants are requested to schedule forappointment. You receive confirmation via email or SMS.Print the last page which has your appointment date andtime. Take the paper with you to your appointment consular.
renewPassport.replacmentofValidPageRunoutDetail: Page runout (not expired) passport, applicants are requested to schedule for appointment. You receive confirmation via email or SMS. Print the last page which has your appointment date and time. Take the paper with you to your appointment consular.
renewPassport.replacmentofValidDetail: Applicants are requested to schedule for appointment. You receive confirmation via email or SMS. Print the last page which has your appointment date and time. Take the paper with you to your appointment consular.
renewPassport.damagedPassportDetail: Damaged passport, applicants are requested to schedule for appointment. You receive confirmation via email or SMS. Print the last page which has your appointment date and time. Take the paper with you to your appointment consular.

requestForm.urgentNote: Request for urgent may be considered if the purpose of travel is for medical or legal emergency purposes, death in the family,etc

common.forUrgent: For Urgent : Additional 50% Payment of the requested document
common.itemOne: Prepare all the required documents for this service.
common.itemTwo: If you are applying for Urgent Services, you must have:
common.itemThree: Check the service fee for new Passport
common.itemThreeParagraph: If your passport has more than 6 month’s validity, the payment will have additional 50% of the requested passport.
common.itemFour: Scan all the required documents and resize them according to the guidelines.
common.itemFive: Payment will be through online and banks using the payment code generated after the application form submitted.
common.itemSix: After you apply for the service, you must print the last page which has your appointment and delivery date and time. Take the paper with you to your appointment.
common.itemSeven: When you come to the office on the appointment date, you need to make sure that:
common.itemSeven1: You have the appointment paper with you
common.itemSeven2: You have all the original required documents with you. These should be the same documents that you uploaded with the Online Application.
common.itemSeven3: If you are applying as an applicant, you should come yourself. Proxy Applications are not allowed and acceptable. If you are applying as a guardian or parent, you have to accompany the child/toddler.

new.title: New Passport applicants must fulfil the following requirements.
new.itemOneL1: Valid Kebele Identity card and authenticated Birth certificate.
new.itemTwo: If you are applying for Urgent Services, you must At least have one of the following

expiredPassport.title: Expired Passport applicants must fulfil the following requirements.
expiredPassport.itemOneL1: Copy  of the expired Passport’s information page.

passportRunout.title: For applicants of passport page run out must fulfil the following requirements.If your passport is With 3 or < 3 pages left
passportRunout.itemOneL1: Copy of the Passport’s information page

damagedPassport.title: For applicants of damaged passport must fulfil the following requirements. If your passport is damaged through different reasons
damagedPassport.itemOneL1: Copy  of the  Passport’s information page or any page of the passport which have the passport number and valid Kebele Identity card
damagedPassport.expired: If the damaged passport is Expired
damagedPassport.notExpired: If the damaged passport is not Expired

lostPassport.title: For applicants of Lost/Stolen passport must fulfil the following requirements.
lostPassport.itemOneL3: Copy of passport or information about the passport if you have.
lostPassport.replacementOfLostPassport: Replacement of lost passport for both valid and expired passport

changeofPassportData.title: Applicants for change of passport data must fulfil the following requirements.If you need to change the passport information like name change, birth place and birth date
changeofPassportData.requestsForCorrection: requests for correction for expired passports
changeofPassportData.replacementForCorrection: Replacement of passport for correction for valid passport

validPassport.title: Applicants for change of passport data must fulfil the following requirements. If your passport is With 2 or {'<'} 2 years of valid date, you should have to put the reason like DV, scholarship, foreign residence permit, and embassy appointment.

applicantUnder18.title: If the applicant is under 18, parents or guardians are required to attach the following document
applicantUnder18.itemOneL1: If Parent, Valid Kebele ID of his/her mother/father or copy of passport information page
applicantUnder18.itemOneL2: If Guardian , legal document from court
applicantUnder18.itemOneL3: Authenticated Birth Certificate of the Applicant.

emergency.title: Emergency requests are handled in INVEA main office or branch offices in person.

about.title: What We Do
about.paragraphOne: This is institution established again by coordinating the prosperity reform works in Ethiopia. It is called FDRE Immigration, Nationality and vital events agency.What history says? On vital events registration from Emperor Minilik to foreign citizens birth and death documents were given and this is clearly stated on historical documents.
about.paragraphTwo: It starts working by following legal outlines on 1942. Based on by state government declaration seventy fourth city officials were assigned to register residence of the city and the title was stated at letter “D” writing on civil status means/birth, marriage and death/.The other thing concerning the ministry authority on order number 1/1935 and number 36 letter “D” by the power of ministry of state for counting public authority for marriage and birth registration on civil status given to it by law by giving power of attorney to the municipality of the city for implementation of better work necessary internal laws and regulations given to it.
about.paragraphThree: Based on 1951 law notification number 150/43 to assign the place for cemetery, controlling cemetery and it is counted as one of activities issued to the municipality by the civil code law drafted on 1960 to implement vital events registration many articles included on this law number 3361 /1/ for implementing those articles concerning with civil status till unique regulation drafted the aim of vital events the process and implementation when it is compared with the modern and proper registration work manner even though it is tried to include some points reserving the gaps concerning vital events registration and collecting information works conducted in different governmental organizations (i.e Municipality, city administration offices, central statistics agency and health center. On this hand, the processes of registration of vital events were conducted in religious organizations. So, in 1943 marriage, in 1954 birth, in 1968 death registration started. This registration done for legal and administrational affairs and by the persons who are willing to register the events certificate is issued. Participants of vital events registration
about.visionDetail: Our vision being one of the 10 best agencies in Africa in 2022 through supporting the information and service provision with technology, making the quality fits with international standards and ensuring its security.
about.missionFirstList: Ensuring the legal movement of people and granting foreign national with citizenship by ensuring reliable, quality and secured documents accessible to users.
about.missionSecondList: Compiling, organizing and making accessible secured complete and quality information and documents to users through utilizing a system supported by research and study, and equipped with technology.
about.missionThirdList: Ensuring the provision of swift and effective service through creating awareness to the public and stakeholders about the importance of the agency service.
